marklogic.body: so just what is that cop looking at when he walks behind zimmerman and stares at the back of his head? and is itnot pluasable that the cops may have taken a bloodied shirt Off of him for evidence? emts would have cleaned up the wounds to see how bad they were before treating them which would include cleaning up the blood and stopping the Bleeding. no one knows what reallyhappened but the truth will come out and so far the truth coming out is a far cry from the truth being portrayed in the msm and by the racist sharpton and jackson. more likely the truth is somewehre in the middle.
